item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-15
item.description: Google is building a new augmented reality device and operating system (3 minute read) Google recently hired a lead for its Operating System team for Augmented Reality and posted job listings that indicate that the company is getting serious about AR.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-08
item.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook engineered a secret $275 billion deal with China (3 minute read) A recently published report details Apple CEO Tim Cook’s efforts to establish strong relationships between Apple and the Chinese government.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-27
item.description: Snapchatâ€™s new AR features can identify the world around you (5 minute read) Scan is a new feature from Snapchat that can identify a range of objects.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-12
item.description: First Apple TV+ AR app launches with ‘For All Mankind’ backstory through mixed reality (3 minute read) First Apple TV+ AR app launches with ‘For All Mankind’ backstory through mixed reality (3 minute read)

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-26
item.description: Amazon’s latest AR shopping tool fills your space with virtual furniture (1 minute read) Room Decorator is Amazon’s new AR shopping tool.
